meaningMnemonic: Because the hiragana ends with an う sound, you know this word is a verb. The kanji itself means <kanji>dye</kanji> so the verb vocab version is <vocabulary>to dye</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: You need <vocabulary>to dye</vocabulary> something that you just <reading>sew</reading>ed (そ) together. It's all sewed and looks like a shirt, but it's colorless. That's where the dying comes in.
